settings.question: How does Botox® Work?
settings.answer:
BOTOX® is derived from botulinum toxin Type A, a neurotoxin that interrupts the signals from your brain to your facial muscles, typically those of the forehead, between the brows, or around the eyes. When these muscles don’t move as much, your skin has a chance to repair the damage that causes wrinkles and lines. The overall effect is a younger, smoother appearance. The art of BOTOX® treatments is in the injection placement, and Balanced Aesthetics can erase your dynamic wrinkles without sacrificing the facial movements that let your personality shine.

BOTOX® Cosmetic:

• Corrects fine lines and wrinkles – primary indication for the forehead, frown lines, crows feet, lip flip

• Takes only 10-15 minutes for complete treatment

• Requires little to no downtime

• Produces within 3-5 days in most patients

• Reverses signs of aging

• Smooths skin

settings.question: What is the Procedure Like?
settings.answer: Having BOTOX® injections is no more painful than a typical pinch of a needle. We use ultra-thin needles and precise dosing to ensure you have as comfortable a treatment as possible. Our provider will thoroughly clean the treatment area(s) before injecting. Your BOTOX® session will take only 10-15 minutes, and you can return to your everyday schedule right away, though you should refrain from strenuous exercise, intense heat, or saunas for at least 12 hours post treatment.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: BOTOX® may cause some muscle weakness, vision problems, or dizziness directly following treatment for some patients. Brow and eyelid drop is rare but may occur in some patients. Allergic reactions are also rare but may occur, causing itching, redness, rashes, and asthma symptoms. Most people feel none of this and only experience some mild injection site tenderness or headache.
